channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Docker Commons Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Docker Commons Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-20617|2024-08-03T02:17:52.926Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker%20commons%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Docker Commons Plugin 1.17 and earlier does not sanitize the name of an image or a tag, resulting in an OS command execution vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission or able to control the contents of a previously configured job's SCM repository.
